title: Stronghold
description: A 5v5 defusal map set atop the mountains of Gibraltar, created for the 2024 Big Adventures Mapcore CS2 contest. Made in collaboration with 3 other people, I was responsible for custom materials, models, and environment art. Map placed within the top 10 among over 200 other submissions.

title: Akiba
description: A 5v5 defusal map set in Akihabara, Japan created for the newly released CS2. Made in collaboration with 3 other people, I was responsible for level design, modelling, and environment art. Map was featured on the FACEIT Mapcore Hub consisting of over 100 thousand players.

title: Shred
description: A 2v2 wingman map set in a skatepark located underneath a downtown city overpass. Made in collaboration with 1 other person, I was responsible for foundational level design, environment art, and models. Map was featured on the FACEIT Mapcore Hub consisting of over 100 thousand players.

title: Acre
description: A 5v5 insertion-style hostage rescue map set in a nondescript North American farm. This map was designed for a custom gamemode colloquially known as "Hardcore." I was responsible for everything involved in the creation of the map, including level design, environment art, and models (excluding a few materials borrowed from a friend).
